GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.15.74
GSD.description:
wifi: mac80211: fix MBSSID parsing use-after-free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.74 by commit de124365a7d2deed22cf706583930f28d537ff0f, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 5023b14cf4df4d22e1a80738167f3438c9e62e5f. For more details please see the references link.
